ANU.name: Mithun Mahawaththage Don
interest: Structural biology, Biomolecular NMR, Biomolecular EPR, Protein mass spectrometry, Cell-free protein synthesis, Genetic code expansion
ANU.biography: Mithun Chamikara currently works at the  Australian National University. Mithun completed his Bachelor of Science honours (2014) at University of Peradeniya, Sri Lanka. Before joining with ANU, he worked as a Teaching and Research Assistant at University of Peradeniya for two years in Plant Biotechnology. He started his PhD in the field of Structural Biology and Protein NMR. He is interested in NMR studies of Viral proteins, Cell free protein synthesis and incorporation of unnatural amino acids to proteins.

publication.title: Solution conformations of a linked construct of the Zika virus NS2B-NS3 protease
